Barbarian.Description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage
Barbarian.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light and medium armor, shields, simple and martial weapons

Bard.Description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation
Bard.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light armor, simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords

Cleric.Description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power
Cleric.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light and medium armor, shields, simple weapons

Druid.Description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature— moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning— and adopting animal forms
Druid.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light and medium armor, shields, clubs, daggers, darts, javelins, maces, Quarterstaves, scimitars, sickles, slings, spears

Fighter.Description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor
Fighter.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: All armor, shields, simple and martial weapons

Monk.Description: Channel your cosmic enlightenment by deftly dodging and efficiently disassembling your foes through stunning strikes and a whirlwind of martial art attacks.

Paladin.Description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath
Paladin.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: All armor, shields, simple and martial weapons

Ranger.Description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization
Ranger.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light and medium armor, shields, simple and martial weapons

Rogue.Description: With stealth, skill and uncanny reflexes, a rogue's versatility lets them get the upper hand in almost any situation.
Rogue.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light armor, simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords

Sorcerer.Description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline

Warlock.Description: Bound by a pact to an all-powerful patron, warlocks trade their loyalty for supernatural abilities and unique magic.

Wizard.Description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality
Wizard.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Daggers, darts, slings, Quarterstaves, light crossbow
